about_the_game:
This bonus pack will really kick-start your career. With level 2 upgrades (chassis, brakes, tyres, suspensions, gearbox, radiator, engine), you can clock the best times from the very first races.
You'll also enjoy the ideal conditions in which to start your career:
• Tyre warmers so you can start the race at the perfect temperature
• Optimum fall management so you can get back on your bike quickly
• Bonus points for the team
• Bonus reputation points for podium finishes
detailed_description:
This bonus pack will really kick-start your career. With level 2 upgrades (chassis, brakes, tyres, suspensions, gearbox, radiator, engine), you can clock the best times from the very first races.
You'll also enjoy the ideal conditions in which to start your career:
• Tyre warmers so you can start the race at the perfect temperature
• Optimum fall management so you can get back on your bike quickly
• Bonus points for the team
• Bonus reputation points for podium finishes

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 i5-2300 or AMD Phenom II X6 1100T
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 630 2GB, or AMD Radeon HD 5870 2GB
  • DirectX: Version 11
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-3770 or AMD FX-8350
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 780, 3 GB or AMD Radeon R9 290X, 4 GB
  • DirectX: Version 11

short_description: You can kick-start your career in multiple ways with this bonus pack: parts to optimise your bike's performance and new skills for your rider and team.
supported_languages:
English*, French*, Italian*, German*, Spanish - Spain*, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, Korean, Japanese, Polish, Portuguese - Brazil, Russian
*languages with full audio support
